field.label: Enable ShadowSocks Server
field.help: This will activate the ShadowSocks Server. This lets people around the world connect via ss-local to your server.

field.label: Server Address
field.help: IP address or hostname of the server.

field.label: Local Port
field.help: The local port of the daemon, default is fine.

field.label: Password
field.help: Password to authenticate against the server.

field.label: Cipher
field.help: Choose the cipher to use for encryption.
